title: Step2 All Around Easel for Two
description: Vertical writing easel makes developing proper writing skills fun!

asset.author: Step2
asset.description: Vertical writing easel makes developing proper writing skills fun!  For more information,visit http://www.step2.com/p/All-Around-Easel-for-Two

transcripts:
What child doesn't like to paint, color, and draw. The all around easel for two is an imitation to artistry that kids can't resist. This arts and crafts essential is a great way to inspire creativity and imagination. With a dry erase board on one side and a chalk board on the other, this versatile easel is ready for anything. It's a huge hit with my kids and their friends who love to draw together and show off their artwork. It even comes equipped with foam magnetic letters and symbols. Plus a clip to hold works of art in progress or to proudly display your child's project.
Vertical writing is encouraged by child experts as a great way to encourage fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. Durable construction makes it easy to clean and ensures that this easel will last through some serious use. It will get plenty in our house. These easy to clean removable storage bins make clean up and organization a breeze.
